src:
Kek brez razloga za revolucijo
Selektor bo danes razkril seznam nogometašev za tekmi z Latvijo in Poljsko.
05 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Jernej Suhadolnik
LJUBLJANA – Kdo je slab mesec po polomu slovenske nogometne reprezentance v boju za euro 2020 še vedno v načrtih selektorja Matjaža Keka? Mariborčan bo popoldne razkril seznam fantov, s katerimi bo prihodnji teden napadel Latvijo in Poljsko. Kek ima le malo razlogov za revolucijo.Številni navijači so upravičeno razočarani nad učinkom Kekovih reprezentantov, od katerih so oktobra pričakovali (naj)več. Josip Iličić, Benjamin Verbič, Andraž Šporar, Petar Stojanović in drugi, ki so septembra veličastno zmleli Poljake, nato pa s požrtvovalnostjo in neverjetno trmo premagali še Izraelce, so mesec pozneje odpovedali kot naivni mladinci v tekmah z Makedonijo in Avstrijo.Logično, da v Stožicah zahtevajo drastične poteze selektorja. Kek je v prvem odzivu napovedal spremembe, potrdil jih je tudi včeraj, v seštevku pa je dovolj izkušen, da pozna resnico: ne obstaja veliko alternativ, ki jih še ne bi preizkusil noben selektor. Ob kadru, ki je dobil priložnost v zadnjih mesecih – Kek v resnici ni veliko menjal –, in skritih resursih na klopi za rezerve igrajo v tujini še nekateri, ki bi jih lahko preizkusil, ko bo napočil čas. Če odmislimo Kevina Kampla in Nejca Skubica, Amedej Vetrih redno igra za Rizespor v Turčiji, standarden član Empolija je Leo Štulac v italijanski v serie B, več jih igra na Poljskem (Korun, Bohar), nekateri so začeli opozarjati nase v Rusiji (Vombergar, Bizjak).
Navijači niso potrpežljivi
Pravih razlogov za kadrovsko revolucijo torej ni. Kdor meni, da bi bilo modro rokohitrsko poslati v ogenj enajsterico slovenskega prvenstva, naj si osveži spomin na kratko evropsko poletje klubov ali zadnji obisk državnega prvaka v Ljubljani. Prvi adut Maribora na gostovanju pri novincu v Spodnji Šiški je bil 41-letni vratarski veteran Jasmin Handanović!Slovenci se bodo resda težko sprijaznili, da uvrščanje nogometašev na nogometni expo – naslednji bo leta 2022 v Dohi – ni samoumevno, kot to velja v drugih kolektivnih panogah, ki niso tako konkurenčne. Navijači niso potrpežljivi, tega jim ne gre očitati, če ne drugega, za uro in pol sproščanja drago plačajo vstopnico. Bolj odgovorni bi morali ravnati drugače, kar so ne nazadnje zaman opozarjali že Kekovi predhodniki Stojanović, Katanec in Kavčič.Zgovorna je primerjava povprečne starosti reprezentantov v primeru uvrstitve na velike turnirje: enajsterica Srečka Katanca, ki je novembra 1999 zgodovinsko zmlela Ukrajino, je v povprečju štela 29,3 leta, enaka kadrovska zasedba je bila novembra 2001 v epskem dvoboju z Romunijo še dve leti starejša … Kekova začetna enajsterica v tekmi z Latvijo – denimo brez poškodovanih 30-letnikov Krhina in Bezjaka – bo štela v povprečju 26,8 leta. To ne pomeni nujno, da je treba vsakogar čakati v nedogled, dejstvo je le, da nekateri zorijo počasi – najstarejši član najbolj nepredvidljive trojice v Kekovi jati Šporar-Stojanović-Verbič je prav slednji, ki bo konec meseca dopolnil 26 let. Velja tudi obratno, po desni so prehitevali prav Kekovi fantje v boju za Južno Afriko (26,6).
text:
Kek for no reason for revolution
The selector will today reveal the list of football players for matches with Latvia and Poland.
05 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Jernej Suhadolnik
LJUBLJANA - Which is a bad month after the collapse of the Slovenian football team in the fight for the Euro 2020 is still in the plans of coach Matjaž Kek? In the afternoon, Maribor will reveal a list of guys with whom it will attack Latvia and Poland next week. Kek has little reason to revolutionize. Many fans are justifiably disappointed with the performance of Kek's national team, many of whom were expected in October. Josip Ilicic, Benjamin Verbic, Andraz Sporar, Petar Stojanovic and others, who grinded the Poles majestically in September and then defeated the Israelis with devotion and stubbornness, were dismissed a month later as naive young men in matches with Macedonia and Austria. The cones require drastic selector moves. In his first response, Kek announced the changes, confirmed them yesterday, but in sum he is experienced enough to know the truth: there are not many alternatives that no selector has yet to test. In addition to the staff that has been given the opportunity in recent months - Kek hasn't really changed much - and the hidden resources on the reserve bench, there are some others who might try it out when the time is right. Thinking of Kevin Kampl and Nejc Skubic, Amedej Vetrih regularly plays for Rizespor in Turkey, Empoli's standard member is Leo Stulac in Italian in Serie B, more are playing in Poland (Korun, Bohar), some have started to draw attention to themselves in Russia (Vombergar, Bizjak).
The fans are not patient
So there are no real reasons for the personnel revolution. Anyone who thinks that it would be wise to send the eleventh Slovenian Championship on fire to refresh the memory of a short European club summer or the last visit of the national champion in Ljubljana. Maribor's first trump card to a rookie in Spodnja Šiška was 41-year-old goalkeeper veteran Jasmin Handanovic! The Slovenians will have a hard time accepting that the inclusion of football players at a football expo - next in Doha in 2022 - is not for granted, as is the case with other collective industries that are not as competitive. Fans are not patient, they should not be blamed for, if nothing else, expensive tickets for an hour and a half. More responsible people should do things differently, as Kek's predecessors Stojanovic, Katanec and Kavcic have pointed out in vain. Comparing the average age of national teams in the event of major tournaments is striking: Eleven Srecko Katanc, who historically ground Ukraine in November 1999, averages was 29.3 years old, the same staff was two years older in an epic duel with Romania in November 2001… Kek's starting eleven in the match with Latvia - for example, without injured 30-year-olds Krhin and Bezjak - will average 26.8 years. This does not necessarily mean that everyone has to wait indefinitely, the fact is that some are maturing slowly - the oldest member of the most unpredictable troika in Kek's Šporar-Stojanović-Verbič flock is the latter, who will turn 26 at the end of the month. The opposite is also true, on the right, Kek's boys overtook South Africa (26.6).
